text: Cargo Airways International was a cargo airline based in Douala, Cameroon. Its main base is Douala International Airport. ==Fleet== , the Cargo Airways International fleet includes the following aircraft: {|class="toccolours" border="1" cellpadding="3" style="border-collapse:collapse" |+Cargo Airways International Fleet |- bgcolor=lightblue !Aircraft !Total !Orders !Passengers (Economy) !Notes |- |Boeing 737-200F |align="center"|1 |align="center"|0 |align="center"|- | |- |Total !1 !0 ! ! |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Defunct airlines of Cameroon Category:Defunct cargo airlines Category:Companies based in Douala
title: Cargo Airways International
